# Security

## Reporting a vulnerability

If you believe you have found a security vulnerability in ComfyUI-UML, please report it:

- **Preferred**: Open a [GitHub Security Advisory](https://github.com/antoinebou12/ComfyUI-UML/security/advisories/new) (private until the maintainer publishes it).
- **Alternatively**: Open a [new issue](https://github.com/antoinebou12/ComfyUI-UML/issues/new) and describe the issue. Avoid posting exploit details in public issues.

We will acknowledge your report and work with you to understand and address it.
